settings.name: Continuous raster file
settings.description: Optionally, upload a local raster file with continuous data to include in the resource selection function analysis. Make sure that the raster data overlap with the tracking data set and are in WGS84 projection! The App requires the following files, named exactly as given: 1. `raster.tif`. Note that fallback raster files of elevation, forest cover, land cover and human modification are provided.

settings.name: Categorical raster file
settings.description: Optionally, upload a local raster file with categorical data to include in the resource selection function analysis. Make sure that the raster data overlap with the tracking data set and are in WGS84 projection! The App requires the following files, named exactly as given: 1. `raster_cat.tif`.

settings.name: Analysis level
settings.description: Specify whether the resource selection analysis should be performed for the population or per individual.

settings.name: Number of layers in the uploaded raster
settings.description: If a local raster file is provided, specify the number of layers contained in the file.
